words.source: H6293 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of פָּגַע 'to encounter, meet'; KJV 'they met', ESV 'they met', NASB 'they met'

H4872 proper name; all trans. agree

H175 proper name; all trans. agree

H3318 prep. b- + Qal inf. constr. + 3mp suff. of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'as they came forth', ESV 'when they came out', NASB 'as they came out'
